text: Znayte, chto zhizn' blizhayshaya - zabava i igra, i krasovaniye i pokhval'ba sredi vas, i sostyazaniye vo mnozhestve imushchestva i detey, napodobiye dozhdya, rasteniye ot kotorogo privodit v vostorg nevernykh; potom ono uvyadayet, i ty vidish' yego pozheltevshim, potom byvayet ono solomoy, a v posledney - sil'noye nakazaniye - i proshcheniye ot Allakha, i blagovoleniye, a zhizn' blizhnyaya - tol'ko pol'zovaniye obmanchivoye
